column2: A blood bond to the Domitor.  Rarely broken, this bond of kindred vitae makes the thrall adore their Domitor.
A blood bond to the Domitor.  Rarely broken, this bond of kindred vitae makes the thrall adore their Domitor.
This ghoul no longer receives vitae from their Domitor.  This slightly weakens the blood bond, but does not break it.
This individual has become entranced by the majestic presence of a vampire.
The innate, mystical power concentrated in dead veins.  It grows over time or through diablerie
The innate, mystical power concentrated in dead veins.  It grows over time or through diablerie

The innate, mystical power concentrated in dead veins.  It grows over time or through diablerie
The innate, mystical power concentrated in dead veins.
Methuselah. One of the most powerfull known vampires.
Methuselah. One of the most powerfull known vampires.
One of the most common vampire genaration.
One of the most common vampire genaration.

Drain the vampire prisoner till their soul is consumed.  The diabolist's aura shows the marks of diablerie.  If the victim had a higher blood potency than the diabolist, the diabolist's blood potency increases.
Drain a prisoner of all their blood--killing them. A cruel act.
Drain a mortal vessel of all their blood.  The mortal dies.   A cruel act.
Drain a werewolf kinfolk mortal vessel of all their blood.  The mortal dies.   A cruel act.
Drain a werewolf vessel of all their blood.  The werewolf dies.   A cruel act.
Drain a mage vessel of all their blood.  The mage dies.   A cruel act.
Drain a demon vessel of all their blood.  The demon dies.   A cruel act.
Drain a geist vessel of all their blood.  The geist is destroyed.   A cruel act.
Drain a changeling vessel of all their blood.  The changeling dies.   A cruel act.
Drain a mummy vessel of all their blood.  The mummy is destroyed.   A cruel act.
Drain a promethean vessel of all their blood.  The promethean is destroyed.   A cruel act.
Use your vampiric blood to create a squad of ghoulish warriors.  This will raise your blood thirst.
Kill a group of mortals and raise them as your vampiric childer to use as war fodder.  This will raise your blood thirst greatly.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your wound.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your severe injury.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your maimed body.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your blinded eyes.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your genetalia.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your disfigured face.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your damaged eye.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your hand.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your leg.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to heal your mangled body.  This will increase your thirst for blood.
Use your vampiric blood to awaken a member of your dynasty in torpor.  This will increase your blood thirst but only a chance to awaken the vampire in torpor.
Give some of your blood to a mortal, making them blood-bound thrall of a vampire. Creating a ghoul will cause your blood thirst to grow.
Turn a mortal human into a vampire.  They will have your clan and bloodline. Creating a vampiric spawn will cause your blood thirst to grow.
Turn a mortal human into a vampire.  They will have your clan and bloodline. Creating a vampiric spawn will cause your blood thirst to grow.

Bloodbind the vampire prisoner to you as domitor.  This thrall will desire to please you.  You feed your blood to your thrall over three nights to make the bond last for a milennia--this will cause your blood thirst to grow.

A wight is a vampire who have lost the entirety of their morals. They are, for all intents and purposes, the Beast within themselves. A character who has fallen to Wassail can never be saved or again played.
Your hunger is unquenchable!  You surrender to the Beast! You enter Wassail--your last frenzy. You become ravenous monster in constant frenzy.  You will be hunted until your last night.
Your hunger grows. You now have the Blood Thirst!
Your hunger grows. You now have the Severe Blood Thirst!
Your hunger grows. You now have the Dreadful Blood Thirst!
Your hunger grows. You now have the Dire Blood Thirst! You have a high chance of either falling into Torpor, or into Wassail and becoming a Wight!

The only thought you can think of is for your Dire Blood Thirst.  How much longer can this go on.  You are starving.  You fade in and out of consciouness--only to awaken near frenzy. You must have blood!
Your blood thirst decreases from direness.
Your blood thirst decreases in dread.
Your blood thirst decreases in severity..
Your thirst for blood is slaked..

Will you abidcate your titles? Will reliquinsh your holdings as Prince of the undead to your heirs? Will you give up your place in kindred society?  Will you go into hiding so that your enmies will not discover your torpid form? Will you seek the slumber of the ages?
Atlast! Rest!  What nightmares make come?
You fall into the deep sleep of the undead. How long will you hold to the edge of the abyss? Years? Decades? Cenutries?
Do I hear a whisper? I still thirst for blood.
Having found a group of men who seem servicable as a militia, you prepare to share with them your vampiric blood to bind their will to yours and enhance their strength.
They aren't worth the blood to me.
You come upon a group of mortals.  While most likely they will never be heirs to your dynasty, you have need of vampiric warriors who far exceed the abilities of humans.
Arise and embrace the night, my childer!
No, I will not bring damnation unto them.
You concentrate on your wound and begin to invoke the healing of the blood.  You feel the blood thirst growing inside you, the beast seeking to be unchained.
Feel the power of the blood!
No. I will survive as I am. For this night...
You concentrate on your maimed body and begin to invoke the healing of the blood.  You feel the blood thirst growing inside you, the beast seeking to be unchained.
Feel the power of the blood!
No. I will survive as I am. For this night...

No. I will survive as I am. For this night...
You concentrate on severed leg and begin to invoke the healing of the blood.  You feel the blood thirst growing inside you, the beast seeking to be unchained.
Place one foot in front of the other.

No. I will survive as I am. For this night...
You have increased your mastery of the blood.
There is still more I could know!
[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] has responded to your mystical summoning.
Welcome to my parlor, said the spider to the fly.
You have mesmerized [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] and can demand from them a favor.
[From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] has become entranced by your presence.
To know me is to love me.
